title: Loading, finding takes forever
body: Guys, I've been playing league for too long but now Im facing this terrible problems.. the problems are.. when I log it.. it takes longer than usual it's like 5mn. And after I finally logged in an I want to find a match but it won't show the estimated time it's just nothing .... and even Custom game I can't create.. I'm using Beta Client. Please I need some help.. thanks..

replies.body: This sounds like your network might be having a hard time talking with our servers. It doesn't mean anything is wrong with your internet, but there might be a setting somewhere preventing you from getting a solid link. Check up on your [**network settings**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) and let me know if none of those steps seem to help!
